sentence.text: The two large men chased the smaller man , caught him and then proceeded to bash his brains out in front of everyone at the tables -- or so it seemed .
His wife would win the hearts of all women if she bashed the judicial scalp with a frying pan .
` Someone bashed him on the back of the head with a heavy smooth object .
` Me bash Charlie on the head with one of them stones ?
After a while they kidnap and murder a young boy for kicks , bashing him over the head with a blunt instrument .
Bashing them over the head would be really tricky , take it from me . "
Once a Squig has been provoked from its lair the Night Goblins throw nets over it then bash it senseless with large clubs so it can be safely dragged away .
Jane reflected that if she 'd been enormous , with masses of stomach and bust up front , Lajos might have thought twice about bashing her .
What I really wanted was to bash him to smithereens .
` His head 's been bashed about a bit , " announced Mr Cross .
I still do n't understand why she was all bashed up .
` Her head and the side of her face had been bashed in , " said Melissa .
They may want to bash their children sometimes .
He altered that to , ` Can you put the light out , dear ? " when she bashed him with the book and asked him to repeat what he had said .
He probably got fed up with the kid 's crying , bashed him against the wall and ran .
